name: HMM Deserialize Processor
description: Deserializes a Hidden Markov Model from disk to the in-memory model repository.

parameters.name: model_name
parameters.description: Name of the HMM model to be deserialized.

parameters.name: file_name
parameters.description: The file name to serialize to.

parameters.name: only_once
parameters.description: Whether or not to serialize only once. If set to true, the model will be serialized upon receival of the first DataPacket only, if set to false it will be overwritten for each new DataPacket.

parameters.name: num_hidden
parameters.description: The number of hidden states of this HMM.

parameters.name: num_observable
parameters.description: The number of observable states of this HMM.

parameters.name: wait_for_load
parameters.description: If set to true, processing only continues after the model has been loaded into memory (sync). If false, processing continues immediately, not knowing when the model has been materialized.
